module.name: Airship Mast
module.description: The noble Airship Mast tells airship crews where to drop incoming goods - preventing unsightly concussions.

module.name: Windmill
module.description: A mill that uses wind.

module.name: Dynamics Support
module.description: A mill that uses wind.

module.name: Water Pump
module.description: Pumps water real good.

module.name: Power Core Dynamo
module.short_description: Crafts Steam Knight Power Cores.
module.description: A complex device with a turbine for winding torque-based Steam Knight components.

module_job.name: Make Spring-Loaded Power Core
module_job.standing_order_display_name: Standing Order for Spring-Loaded Power Cores

module.name: Steam Knight Forge
module.short_description: Creates Steam Knights out of various components.
module.description: This monstrous forge is necessary to allow the huge parts of a steam knight to fit inside. Once a steam knight is forged, it can never be disassembled without destroying it.

module_job.name: Make Steam Knight Prototype
module_job.standing_order_display_name: Standing Order for Prototype Steam Knights

module_job.name: Make Steam Knight MK-1
module_job.standing_order_display_name: Standing Order for Steam Knight MK-1s

module.name: Stone Ceramics Kiln
module.short_description: Produces bricks. Cannot produce glass.
module.description: A crude stone kiln suitable (just) for firing ceramics. A better Kiln is required to make glass.

module.name: Brick Ceramics Kiln
module.short_description: Produces bricks, glass, and glass products.
module.description: A kiln built of solid bricks for firing ceramic products - hotter than a stone kiln, it is capable of creating glass.

module.name: Iron Ceramics Kiln
module.short_description: Produces bricks, glass, and glass products in bulk.
module.description: A fine kiln built of iron plates for firing ceramic products.

module.name: Stone Smelting Crucible
module.short_description: Refines metals from ores.
module.description: A crude smelter built of rough stone, suitable (just) for extracting metals from ores.

require_session_bool.name: steelworking_research_unlocked
require_session_bool.failure_reason: Requires researching Steelworking at laboratory.

require_session_bool.name: steelworking_research_unlocked
require_session_bool.failure_reason: Requires researching Steelworking at laboratory.

require_session_bool.name: AllowUraniumCrafting
require_session_bool.failure_reason: This is a special event-only recipe!

module.name: Brick Charcoal Kiln
module.short_description: Produces charcoal from wood.
module.description: A kiln built of solid bricks and a bit of iron - to contain the heat - for producing charcoal.

module.name: Iron Charcoal Kiln
module.short_description: Produces charcoal from wood.
module.description: An advanced charcoal kiln that burns charcoal more quickly than lesser kilns.

module.name: Still
module.short_description: Produces strong spirits from less concentrated alcohol.
module.description: The distillation of strong spirits is important for the well-being of any colony. The industrial still will ensure your pub keeps your colonists happy as can be.

require_session_bool.name: biomeTemperate,biomeCold
require_session_bool.failure_reason: Wheat can only be grown in certain climates.

module.name: Macroscope

module.name: Standing Desk
module.short_description: Used for conducting diplomacy in a Foreign Office, or Mineral Surveys in a Naturalist's Office.
module.description: An exceedingly practical design, the standing desk allows the Overseer to maintain a position of Maximum Industry while processing paperwork.

module.name: Steam Oven
module.short_description: Produces cooked food in massive bulk.
module.description: A technological marvel with a cost to match, this oven uses aetheric forces to heat your food while infusing it with humour-enhancing fluids.

module.name: Power Saw
module.short_description: Produces planks very efficiently.
module.description: The final word in plank production. Widely used despite being nicknamed 'The Widowmaker' for its role in many a grievous industrial incident.

module.name: Ceramics Press
module.short_description: Produces bricks, glass, and glass products in massive bulk.
module.description: Invented by Lord Palmerstoke himself, the Ceramics Press is an alarming device guaranteed to crunch clay and other materials into submission with a minimum of casualties.

module.name: Industrial Kiln
module.short_description: Produces charcoal very efficiently.
module.description: A factory-grade charcoal kiln that would impress even the Great Glaubenschaufel. A monolith of brick and steel.

module.name: Grinder
module.short_description: Produces simple goods from unwanted raw materials.
module.description: Designed by a small cult of coffee addicts, this fearsome device now sees widespread use in the extraction of additional ore from stone.

module.name: Power Stamper
module.short_description: Produces metal plates in bulk.
module.description: A vital part of every Steam Knight manufactory, the power stamper will smash metal, or anything else that happens to get caught in it, into nice flat plates.

require_session_bool.name: discovery_steelworking_steamknight
require_session_bool.failure_reason: Requires researching Steam Knight Tech at laboratory.

require_session_bool.name: discovery_steelworking_steamknight
require_session_bool.failure_reason: Requires researching Steam Knight Tech at laboratory.

module.name: Power Lathe
module.short_description: Produces metal pipes in bulk.
module.description: Companion to the power stamper, the power lathe makes pipes and weapon barrels extremely quickly via the use of tiny aetheric vortices. Please keep all items firmly attached to your person when standing near the vortices.

module.name: Dewatering Pump
module.short_description: Allows deeper mining.
module.description: An important stepping stone for an ore mine, this fine module prevents flooding from above or belowground water.

module.name: Ventilation Unit
module.short_description: Allows much deeper mining.
module.description: Used to clear out poisonous gases and ensure the circulation of breathable air, the Mine Ventilation Unit is a necessity for digging deeper mines.

module.name: Steam Distributor
module.description: This experimental device, inspired by Lord Palmerstoke's most recent treatise on dentistry, is thought to allow for the softening of deep rock, allowing us to reach previously unknown depths. What we will find down there is anyone's guess.
module.short_description: Allows very, very, very deep mining.

module.name: Lamp (Small)
module.short_description: A cheap lamp-on-a-log to keep the darkness at bay. (Decorative)

module.name: Lamp (Medium)
module.short_description: A lovely Lamppost to keep the darkness at bay. (Decorative)

module.name: Lamp (Large)
module.short_description: An ostentatious triple-lamppost to keep the darkness at bay. (Decorative)

module.name: Minum Gun Turret
module.description: What is it that we have Got? The Minum Gun, and they have not.

module.name: Bunker
module.short_description: Used for protection.
module.description: Bunk in your Bunker.

module.name: Rare Painting
module.short_description: Place in a house to increase population cap.
module.description: An ostentatious painting by a certain famous artist - these can only be found via events and other opportunities, not created by the colony.

module.description: An ostentatious painting by a certain famous artist - these can only be found via events and other opportunities, not created by the colony.

module.description: Practical imagery fit for the professional class - these can only be found via events and other opportunities, not created by the colony.

module.name: Fancy Bookshelf
module.short_description: Used in a Training Academy to learn all sorts of things. Trains faster than a normal Bookshelf.
module.description: Fancy reading material dwells here.

module.name: Bookshelf
module.short_description: Used in a Training Academy to learn all sorts of things!
module.description: Reading material dwells here.

module.name: LC Cabinet
module.short_description: Decor increases the Quality of your building, improving the mood of those who live and work there.
module.description: A dingy cabinet suitable for lower class Labourers.

module.name: MC Cabinet
module.short_description: Decor increases the Quality of your building, improving the mood of those who live and work there.
module.description: A cabinet equal parts handsome and practical, perfect for Overseers.

module.name: UC Cabinet
module.short_description: Decor increases the Quality of your building, improving the mood of those who live and work there.
module.description: A richly-worked cabinet, doubtless full of treasures. Fit for Aristocrats.

module.name: Lower Class Door 00
module.short_description: Lets people exit and enter buildings.
module.description: A crude but effective door.

module.name: Middle Class Door 00
module.short_description: Lets people exit and enter buildings.
module.description: A well-cut, fine, and practical door for the middle classes.

module.name: Upper Class Door 00
module.short_description: Lets people exit and enter buildings.
module.description: An ornately wrought portal suitable for Our Betters.

module.name: Loading Bay Door
module.short_description: Lets people exit and enter buildings. A bit roomier than a normal door.
module.description: A wide loading bay door, for the easy delivery and export of materials.

module.name: Lower Class Window 00
module.short_description: Improves housing. Otherwise, entirely cosmetic.
module.description: It lets in the cold and lets out the smell.

module.name: Lower Class Window 01
module.short_description: Improves housing. Otherwise, entirely cosmetic.
module.description: It lets in the cold and lets out the smell.

module.name: Middle Class Window 00
module.short_description: Improves housing. Otherwise, entirely cosmetic.
module.description: A fine window for fine people; all appears as it should.

module.name: Upper Class Window
module.short_description: Improves housing. Otherwise, entirely cosmetic.
module.description: The finest viewing-glass for the finest people in the Empire.

module.name: Stained Glass Window 00
module.short_description: Decor increases the Quality of your building, improving the mood of those who live and work there.
module.description: A fine stained glass window for use in chapels.

module.name: Stained Glass Window 01
module.short_description: Decor increases the Quality of your building, improving the mood of those who live and work there.
module.description: A fine stained glass window for use in chapels.

module.name: Booze Vat
module.short_description: Used to store alcohol for your colonists to drink from in a pub.
module.description: Stores alcoholic beverages for dispensation at the pub; this industrial size booze vat can store many gallons of fine hooch.

module.name: Carpentry Workbench
module.short_description: Produces basic wood products.
module.description: A basic workbench for carpentry and woodworking.

module.name: Cot
module.short_description: For Labourers to sleep on. Sleeping on beds makes colonists happier.
module.description: A crude cot, suitable for a Labourer Bunkhouse.

module.name: Middle Class Bed
module.short_description: For Overseers to sleep on. Sleeping on beds makes colonists happier.
module.description: A comfortable single bed, with a restrained aesthetic that appeals to the no-nonsense middle class.

module.name: Upper Class Bed
module.short_description: For Aristocrats to sleep on. Sleeping on beds makes colonists happier.
module.description: A lavish bed, ostentatious enough for the upper classes.

module.name: Lower Class Table and Chair Set
module.short_description: Functions the same as a chair.
module.description: A robust wooden table and chair for the lower classes.

module.name: Middle Class Table and Chair Set
module.short_description: Improves Overseer Housing. Otherwise acts as any other chair.
module.description: A practical, well-wrought table and chair.

module.name: Upper Class Table and Chair Set
module.short_description: Acts as a chair.
module.description: A lovely table and chair of rich and fabulous construction.

module.name: Steam Radiator
module.short_description: Decor increases the Quality of your building, improving the mood of those who live and work there.
module.description: A steam powered radiator for those cold winter nights.

module.name: Lower Class Chair
module.short_description: Used in Chapels, Barbershops and Pubs for drinking/receiving medical attention/etc.
module.description: A simple, rugged wooden chair.

module.name: Middle Class Chair
module.short_description: Used in Chapels, Barbershops and Pubs for drinking/receiving medical attention/etc.
module.description: A study, practical chair constructed of fine wood.

module.name: Upper Class Chair
module.short_description: Used in Chapels, Barbershops and Pubs for drinking/receiving medical attention/etc.
module.description: A vertiable throne, used by Our Betters.

module.name: Clothes Line 01
module.short_description: Decor increases the Quality of your building, improving the mood of those who live and work there.
module.description: A small line for drying clothes on.

module.name: Clothes Line 05
module.short_description: Decor increases the Quality of your building, improving the mood of those who live and work there.
module.description: A large line for drying clothes on.

module.name: Spice Rack
module.short_description: Decor increases the Quality of your building, improving the mood of those who live and work there.
module.description: A collection of spices. Includes Gen. Cogburn's famous Auroch Steak Dry Rub.

module.name: Hanging Pots
module.short_description: Decor increases the Quality of your building, improving the mood of those who live and work there.
module.description: Makeware is the chef's sword and shield in battle against raw food.

module.name: Stone Plinth
module.short_description: Decor increases the Quality of your building, improving the mood of those who live and work there.
module.description: A Stone Plinth for feeling fancy around.

module.name: Wood Plinth
module.short_description: Decor increases the Quality of your building, improving the mood of those who live and work there.
module.description: A Wood Plinth for feeling civilised around.

module.name: Pot Amphora 00
module.short_description: Decor increases the Quality of your building, improving the mood of those who live and work there.
module.description: A lovely clay pot for livening up any sort of room.

module.name: Pot Amphora 01
module.short_description: Decor increases the Quality of your building, improving the mood of those who live and work there.
module.description: A lovely clay pot for livening up any sort of room.

module.short_description: Decor increases the Quality of your building, improving the mood of those who live and work there.
module.description: A lovely clay pot for livening up any sort of room.

module.name: Pot Calyx Krater
module.short_description: Decor increases the Quality of your building, improving the mood of those who live and work there.
module.description: A lovely clay pot for livening up any sort of room.

module.name: Lower Class Rug 00
module.short_description: Decor increases the Quality of your building, improving the mood of those who live and work there.
module.description: A small, cozy rug.

module.name: Middle Class Rug 00
module.short_description: Decor increases the Quality of your building, improving the mood of those who live and work there.
module.description: A well-made rug.

module.name: Middle Class Rug 01
module.short_description: Decor increases the Quality of your building, improving the mood of those who live and work there.
module.description: A well-made rug.

module.name: Upper Class Rug 00
module.short_description: Decor increases the Quality of your building, improving the mood of those who live and work there.
module.description: An ostentatious rug.

module.name: Carpet00
module.short_description: Decor increases the Quality of your building, improving the mood of those who live and work there.
module.description: An intricate and finely woven carpet that really ties the place together.

module.name: Carpet01
module.short_description: Decor increases the Quality of your building, improving the mood of those who live and work there.
module.description: A fine carpet that really ties the place together.

module.name: Lower Class Wall Shrine
module.short_description: Decor increases the Quality of your building, improving the mood of those who live and work there.
module.description: A shrine for the lower class.

module.name: Upper Class Wall Shrine
module.short_description: Decor increases the Quality of your building, improving the mood of those who live and work there.
module.description: A more ostentatious shrine for the upper class.

module.name: Bureaucrat's Desk
module.short_description: Attains superior diplomacy results over a standing desk.
module.description: Just as a running engine gives off heat, so the functioning of the empire generates massive amounts of paperwork. Even on the frontier, the keeping of detailed records is paramount!

module.name: Barbershop Pole
module.description: It's not really a barbershop unless you have one of these.

module.name: Lamp 00
module.short_description: Decor increases the Quality of your building, improving the mood of those who live and work there.
module.description: A lovely outdoor lamp. Best keep the night away lest you find unwanted things lurking.

module.name: Lamp 01
module.short_description: Decor increases the Quality of your building, improving the mood of those who live and work there.
module.description: A lovely outdoor lamp. Best keep the night away lest you find unwanted things lurking.

module.name: Lamp 02
module.short_description: Decor increases the Quality of your building, improving the mood of those who live and work there.
module.description: A lovely outdoor lamp. Best keep the night away lest you find unwanted things lurking.

module.name: Lamp 03
module.short_description: Decor increases the Quality of your building, improving the mood of those who live and work there.
module.description: A lovely outdoor lamp. Best keep the night away lest you find unwanted things lurking.

module.name: Lamp 04
module.short_description: Decor increases the Quality of your building, improving the mood of those who live and work there.
module.description: A lovely outdoor lamp. Best keep the night away lest you find unwanted things lurking.

module.name: Wall-Mounted Aurochs Head
module.short_description: Decor increases the Quality of your building, improving the mood of those who live and work there.
module.description: About as much of the Majestic Aurochs as one can reasonably put on display.

module.name: Wall-Mounted Beetle Head
module.short_description: Decor increases the Quality of your building, improving the mood of those who live and work there.
module.description: This massive beetle makes for an intimidating - and dangerous - wall decoration.

module.name: Barometer
module.short_description: Decor increases the Quality of your building, improving the mood of those who live and work there.
module.description: A device for measuring atmospheric pressure. Made at the Metalworks.

module.name: Large Pipe and Valve
module.short_description: Decor increases the Quality of your building, improving the mood of those who live and work there.
module.description: A rather large pipe with an appropriately sized valve. Made at the Metalworks.

module.name: Vent
module.short_description: Decor increases the Quality of your building, improving the mood of those who live and work there.
module.description: For vacating vile vapors via ventilation. Made at the Metalworks.

module.name: Pipe Cluster
module.short_description: Decor increases the Quality of your building, improving the mood of those who live and work there.
module.description: A cluster of pipes. Made at the Metalworks.

module.name: Stone Altar
module.short_description: Used to conduct sermons.
module.description: A finely crafted stone altar, for holding finely crafted sermons.

module.name: Large Stone Altar
module.short_description: Used to conduct sermons.
module.description: An impressively large stone altar for holding impressively large sermons.

module.name: Wooden Altar
module.short_description: Used to conduct sermons.
module.description: A humble wooden altar from which a vicar may hold sermons.

module.name: Candelabra
module.short_description: Decor increases the Quality of your building, improving the mood of those who live and work there.
module.description: A large brass candelabra.

module.name: Church Banner
module.short_description: Decor increases the Quality of your building, improving the mood of those who live and work there.
module.description: A banner displaying the symbol of the Church of The Divine Mechanic, The Cog Rho.

module.name: Chalkboard
module.short_description: Used for scientific research.
module.description: A Chalkboard, for writing down Important Thoughts.

module.name: Musket Locker
module.short_description: Used to supply a barracks with improvised muskets, or allows a Naturalist's Office to hunt animals.
module.description: This is a version of the archaic firearm upon which the Empire was built. Improvised with a hardwood barrel on a civilian pistol base. Place this module in a barracks to unlock this weapon for that military crew.

module.name: Carbine Locker
module.short_description: Used to supply a barracks with carbines.
module.description: This quick-firing rifle of Stahlmarkian design had its blueprints leaked by the infamous Sydney the Rosare, and sees occasional seen use in the Empire. Place this module in a barracks to unlock this weapon for that military crew.

module.name: Blunderbuss Locker
module.short_description: Used to supply a barracks with blunderbusses.
module.description: Favoured for defending one's cottage or steam-carriage from ne'er-do-wells, this stout firearm may unleash a hail of shot at close range. Place this module in a barracks to unlock this weapon for that military crew.

module.name: Jezail Rifle Locker
module.short_description: Used to supply a barracks with Jezail rifles.
module.description: A wholly dishonourable weapon, this rifle is accurate at long-range, allowing a soldier to fire upon their enemy without fear of reprisal. Place this module in a barracks to unlock this weapon for that military crew.

module.name: Tripistol Locker
module.short_description: Used to supply a barracks with Ceramic Tripistols
module.description: A common civilian pistol modified with a large hardened ceramic triple-barrel. It will fire a burst of shot at close-range target. Place this module in a barracks to unlock this weapon for that military crew.

module.name: Revolver Locker
module.short_description: Used to supply a barracks with revolvers.
module.description: A powerful handgun that can fire multiple times before reloading - its capacity should be more than enough to kill anything that moves. Place this module in a barracks to unlock this weapon for that military crew.

module.name: Grenade Launcher Locker
module.short_description: Used to supply a barracks with grenade launchers.
module.description: An unwieldy weapon that costs a fortune to maintain, this monstrosity's explosions will absolutely, positively kill everything in the general vicinity, including: Your colonists, commodities, nearby trees, buildings, etc. Please exercise caution. Place this module in a barracks to unlock this weapon for that military crew.

module.name: Leyden Pistol Locker
module.short_description: Used to supply a barracks with Leyden pistols
module.description: A rather unusual weapon that uses electrical discharges rather than bullets to fire. No reloading! Just don't tell the ministry you've been getting so friendly with the Stahlmarkians. Place this module in a barracks to unlock this weapon for that military crew.

module.name: Leyden Rifle Locker
module.short_description: Used to supply a barracks with Leyden rifles.
module.description: The latest Stahlmarkian design, this electric rifle is frighteningly powerful - who knows what the Empire Legion would do with this in their hands. Best not to find out. Place this module in a barracks to unlock this weapon for that military crew.

building.name: Barbershop
building.description: Do not put the barbershop next to the pie store.

building.name: Carpentry Workshop
building.description: The most fundamental of colony buildings, necessary for wordworking, furniture building, and many other things.

require_building_module.failure_reason: You need a chair in the building (for debug purposes.)

building.name: Metalworks
building.description: An advanced production workshop, the Metalworks facilitates the building of a great many things, including metal modules, weaponry, and more.

building.name: Steam Knight Manufactory
building.description: This advanced workshop is used to craft Steam Knights, the ultimate weapon.

building.name: Ceramics Workshop
building.description: An intermediate production workshop, the Ceramics Workshop allows the working of stone and clay into vital construction materials and modules.

building.name: Mine
building.description: Mines enable extraction of valuable ores and minerals from the stygian depths - build them near product beacons to make them even more effective.

building.name: Lower Class House
building.description: A simple but functional bunkhouse which fulfills the unsophisticated domestic requirements of the common Labourer.

building.name: Middle Class House
building.description: A stimulating domicile to meet the domestic needs of middle-class overseers and artisans.

addition.name: Middle Class Table and Chair Set

building.name: Upper Class House
building.description: An ostentatious display of Clockworkian architecture designed for the needs of the upper-classes. Homes for your Betters must be constructed before they will deign to immigrate to your colony.

addition.name: Upper Class Table and Chair Set

building.name: Show All Modules
building.description: Useful modules for workshops. Probably.

building.name: Show All Decor
building.description: Pointless adornments to help pretend Everything Is Okay.

building.name: Show All Doors Windows
building.description: Doors and windows for houses and workshops alike. Holes in walls don't discriminate.

building.name: Show All Furniture
building.description: Oh look, things we can rub our bodies on! Mmm.. soft...

addition.name: Lower Class Table and Chair Set
Middle Class Table and Chair Set
Upper Class Table and Chair Set

building.name: Show All Art
building.description: To understand art we must first discuss what we meaBANG...BANGBANGBANG

building.name: Chapel
building.description: A place of worship for members of the Church of Divine Mechanics; fights malign influence and improves colonists' moods.

building.name: Public House
building.description: A place of drinking and good cheer! Supplies booze to your thirsty workers at the end of a long day, keeping them happy and productive.

addition.name: Lower Class Table and Chair Set

building.name: Kitchen
building.description: Necessary for the cooking of raw food into a Proper Meal.

building.name: Chemical Works
building.description: A specialized production workshop, the Chemical works enables production of gunpowder, medicinal tonics, and other potent concoctions - if you have the unusual ingredients to make them.

building.name: Laboratory
building.description: A home for the noble Pursuit of Science - assign crews here to research Frontier Technologies that improve your colony and expand the modules and products you can build.

building.name: Naturalist's Office
building.description: A base for Those Who Venture, Naturalists are capable of exploring, discovering resource veins for mines, or hunting animals.

building.name: Foreign Office
building.description: The Foreign Office allows us to interact with other factions, improving our relationships and allowing us to ask for favors.

building.name: Trade Office
building.description: The Trade Office allows visiting merchants to buy, sell and trade goods with your colony.

building.name: Barracks
building.description: A fundamental colony building, Overseers assigned here will become your colony's military and keep your colonists safe.

building.name: Training Academy
building.description: Overseers can use this lovely building to learn all sorts of things!
